choices.D: Enable OSPF on the Area-0 routers and configure MP-BGP between routers R1 and R3.
choices.C: Enable MP-BGP peering on routers R1, R3, R4, and R5.
choices.B: Enable route filtering between routers R1 and R3.
choices.A: Enable OSPF peering and configure route redistribution between routers R4 and R1.

discussion.content: Is this Q for IOS XE or IOS XR ??? Enable SR in IOS XR is under routing process. For IOS XE first globally and then under the routing process

choices.B: Segment routing must first be enabled globally and then under the routing process
choices.C: Segment routing can be enabled only under the routing process
choices.D: Segment routing can be enabled only globally
choices.A: Segment routing must first be enabled under then routing process and then globally

questions.question_text: Which statement about enabling segment routing for IGPs is true?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
SID is not changed from node to node like MPLS.

choices.C:
Router2(config)# segment-routing
Router2(config-sr)# mapping-server
Router2(config-sr-ms)# prefix-sid-map
Router2(config-sr-ms-map)# address-family ipv4
Router2(config-sr-ms-map-af)# 10.1.1.1/32 500 range 50

Router2(config-sr-ms-map)# address-family ipv4

Selected Answer: C
CEF must be configured on all the routers in a MPLS network.
CEF takes care of the crucial “recursion” and “resolution” operations

https://www.ciscolive.com/c/dam/r/ciscolive/us/docs/2019/pdf/5eU6DfQV/TECMPL-3201.pdf p68

choices.B: Advertise P1 router loopback on PE1 in OSPF.
choices.A: Enable LDP protocol on PE1 and PE2 routers.
choices.D: Advertise PE2 router loopback on PE1 in OSPF.
choices.C: Enable CEF-based forwarding on PE1 router.
